textAssessment.title: Assessment Editor for Text Exercises
textAssessment.loading: Please wait while Artemis finds the submission!

heading.exampleAssessment: Example Assessment Editor for Text Exercise {{exerciseTitle}}

textAssessment.resultDismissed: Your assessment was rejected because another tutor has already graded this submission.

error.invalidScoreMustBeNumber: The points field must be a number and can not be empty!
error.invalidNeedScoreOrFeedback: Each Feedback item must have at least points or feedback text.
error.feedbackReferenceTooLong: Please select a text block shorter than 2000 characters.

textAssessment.assessInstruction: Please highlight the text block you want to assess and click the "Assess" button.
textAssessment.lock: You now have the lock on this submission. Only you can assess this submission. Please assess this submission before opening other submissions.

dashboard.heading: Submissions and assessments of text exercise "{{exerciseTitle}}"

textAssessment.notFound: We couldn't find any unassessed text submissions. Please return to the dashboard.
textAssessment.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel the assessment? Your current assessment progress will be deleted and the submission will be available for assessment to other tutors again.

feedbackEditor.dismissFeedback: Do you want to delete this feedback?
feedbackEditor.dismissFeedbackConfirmation: Please confirm that you want to delete this feedback!
feedbackEditor.impactWarning: This feedback might affect {{affectedSubmissionsCount}} other similar submission/s.
feedbackEditor.impactWarningTooltip: The number of times that your feedback will be reused as an automatic suggestion in other submissions that were found to have a similar text block.

automaticFeedbackInformationModal.heading: Automatic Feedback Tracing
automaticFeedbackInformationModal.introduction:
This automatic suggestion comes from a previously graded submission shown below.
The highlighted feedback has been reused:
automaticFeedbackInformationModal.trace: Find out where this suggestion comes from

textAssessment.assessmentInstruction:
Please hover over and click on the text block you want to assess.
To assess custom text blocks, hold alt/option while clicking in any order on the first and last word of a text segment.

conflict.notFound: We couldn't find any conflicts for the selected feedback, please go back.
